lines.name: Ezomyte Hold

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: A moment of victory may last an eternity in memory.

lines.name: The Signal Fire

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Bow Attacks
4 to 8 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (25-35)% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
(31-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks
Adds 5 to 10 Fire Damage to Bow Attacks
Gain (25-35)% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
Fire spreads thick and fast.
The first spark is never the last.

lines.name: Brinerot Flag

implicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% increased Spell Damage

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-3) to Level of Socketed Warcry Gems
Gain 2 Power Charges when you Warcry
Gain +3 Mana when you hit a Taunted Enemy
Warcries grant Arcane Surge to you and Allies, with 10% increased effect per 5 power, up to 50%
Gain 3 Mana per Taunted Enemy Hit

lines.flavourText: The lords of the sea bow to no one.

lines.name: Rainbowstride
lines.flavourText:
"They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

lines.name: The Peregrine

explicitModifiers.text: (0.2-0.4)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
We wander to pass time.
We travel to fulfill.

lines.name: Cospri's Will

implicitModifiers.text: 3% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse
Your Curses can apply to Hexproof Enemies
Your Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
60% chance to Poison on Hit against Cursed Enemies
Always Poison on Hit against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Curse their vile Council,
They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.
If they only knew the power I possess.

lines.name: March of the Legion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(2-5) to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 25 Blessing
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 25 Divine Blessing

lines.flavourText: When the time comes to face evil, the faithful are never alone.

lines.name: Alberon's Warpath

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks
Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you

Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you
Summon Skeletons cannot Summon more than 1 Skeleton Warrior

lines.flavourText:
Alberon walked among the accursed,
and they welcomed him.

lines.name: Hyrri's Bite

implicitModifiers.text: +(6-8) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
+(3-8) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (3-8) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Cold Damage to Attacks
+(2-3) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (2-3) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
A Karui woman's place was not the 
battlefield, but the hearth.
Hyrri changed all of that.

lines.name: Lightpoacher

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Spirit Burst when you Use a Skill while you have a Spirit Charge
+1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
(15-20)% chance to gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
Recover (4-5)% of Life when you lose a Spirit Charge
Gain 5% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element per Spirit Charge

lines.flavourText:
The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

lines.name: Death's Oath

implicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% to all Elemental Resistances

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Death Aura when Equipped
1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Deals 450 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You take 450 Chaos Damage per second for (3-10) seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Tears of blood, aching heart,
My dear Isildria must depart.

lines.name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: (20-35)% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
(50-100)% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

lines.name: Saffell's Frame

implicitModifiers.text: +(4-8)% to all Elemental Resistances
Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: A swift mind solves problems before they occur.

lines.name: Surgebinders

explicitModifiers.text: (4-7)% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
(4-7)% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
(4-7)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
(10-30)% reduced Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focussed
29% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focussed
120% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focussed
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Recover (37-40)% of Mana and Energy Shield when you Focus
(50-120)% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focused
(10-12)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focused
(18-32)% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focused
+(3227-3987) to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Ceaseless Feast

implicitModifiers.text: (16-20)% increased Melee Damage

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (2-3) to (22-26) Physical Damage to Attacks
(20-30)% chance to inflict Corrosion on Hit with Attacks
(20-30)% chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Hitting an Enemy with no Armour
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hitting an Enemy with no Evasion Rating

lines.flavourText:
Lost in a sea of limbs and screaming faces, they claw
for any fleeting pleasure which might dull the pain.

lines.name: Lightning Coil

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
(30-50)% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Vix Lunaris

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Cold Aegis when Equipped

lines.flavourText:
Silent, silent night,
Quench the holy light.

lines.name: Shaper's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: (1-2)% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-25) to maximum Mana

explicitModifiers.text: (1-4)% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (15-75) Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Blasphemer's Grasp

explicitModifiers.text: +6 to Maximum Life per Elder Item Equipped
15% increased Damage with Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
+4% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
8% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
Remove an Ailment when you use a Flask if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
Reaching nature's limits, 
many sought power in the unnatural.

lines.name: Stormcharger

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

lines.name: Obscurantis

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Projectile Attack Damage per 200 Accuracy Rating

lines.flavourText: If you know where to strike, you need only strike once.

lines.name: The Broken Crown

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 20 Cast on Death
20% increased Damage when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Every rule has an exception.

lines.name: The Baron

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Half of your Strength is added to your Minions
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies per (300-500) Strength
With at least 1000 Strength, (1.5-2)% of Damage dealt by your Raised Zombies is Leeched to you as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The Emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who 
practice the dark arts. Some of us are just more discreet."

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Skill affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Zeel's Amplifier

implicitModifiers.text: +(4-7)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage
4% chance to Dodge Attack Hits
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently

lines.flavourText:
"Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis, 
is the only secret worth discovering." 
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

lines.name: Maw of Conquest

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
(10-20)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life
(10-20)% of Damage taken gained as Life over 4 seconds when Hit

lines.flavourText:
Young Napuatzi was thrown into the pits, an unwilling sacrifice, 
but the offer of her blood was refused. 
She rose from the pit alive and anew.  
A Leader. A Conquerer. A Viper.

lines.name: Thrillsteel
lines.flavourText:
We may fight, and we may die, but in these
moments of blood and battle, we truly live.

lines.name: Bones of Ullr

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Raise Zombie Gems
+1 to Level of all Raise Spectre Gems

lines.flavourText:
The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

lines.name: Dusktoe

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +50% to Chaos Resistance during any Flask Effect
Adds (15-40) to (25-60) Chaos Damage to Spells and Attacks during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"A lick of shadow may ease 
the petty frictions of one's life."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Heatshiver

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
(20-30)% increased Cold Damage if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
(20-30)% increased Fire Damage if you have used a Cold Skill Recently
Gain (30-100)% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

lines.name: Infernal Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-3) to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
(15-100)% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana

lines.flavourText:
Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies. 
Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Maligaro's Lens

implicitModifiers.text: Reflects (51-70) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
2% chance to Dodge Spell Hits
+(2-3)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby allies Recover (1-2)% of your Maximum Life when you Die

lines.flavourText:
"Look around you. What do you see? 
Corruption, perversion, sin?
No. It is progress. 
You simply lack the means to see it." 
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Veil of the Night

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 1 to (180-220) Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText:
The seeds of greatness are planted in darkness,
Watered by suffering,
Tended by desperation,
And bloom steel flowers of victory.

lines.name: The Gull

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy
Gain (10-15) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed
75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you

lines.flavourText:
"It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor.
The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our
souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life.
The Gull gives us our Way."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Mutewind Pennant

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Warcry Gems
Gain Onslaught for 4 seconds when you Warcry
You gain Onslaught for 2 seconds on Killing Taunted Enemies

lines.flavourText: Embrace the snow or be buried.

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

lines.name: Redblade Banner

implicitModifiers.text: +(20-45) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Warcry Gems
Gain +10 Life when you Taunt an Enemy
2% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Taunted Enemies

lines.flavourText: Blood shed is blood shared.

lines.name: Seven-League Step
lines.flavourText:
"Death can be outrun with these, but beware!
In running from death, you may forget to live."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 202

lines.name: The Anticipation

implicitModifiers.text: +(30-40) to maximum Life

lines.flavourText:
We are within her reach,
and when the time is right,
she will reach into us.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Uul-Netol}

lines.name: Emperor's Vigilance

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot Block while you have no Energy Shield

Damage taken from Blocked Hits cannot bypass Energy Shield
Damage taken from Unblocked hits always bypasses Energy Shield

Damage from Blocked Hits cannot bypass Energy Shield
Damage from Unblocked hits always bypasses Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Chitus' success stemmed from his cunning, taking calculated
risks so that greater dangers could be averted.

lines.name: Stormseeker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Effect of Chills you inflict while Leeching Mana
(60-100)% increased Effect of Shocks you inflict while Leeching Energy Shield
Unaffected by Chill while Leeching Mana
Unaffected by Shock while Leeching Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The fundamental forces of our world are secrets
to be uncovered by the intelligent and the capable.
Like all secrets, they, too, can be stolen.

lines.name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 2% of Life per second while on Low Life
Gain up to maximum Endurance Charges when you take a Critical Strike
Gain an Endurance Charge when you take a Critical Strike
Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
Your nearby party members maximum Endurance Charges is equal to yours
Regenerate 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds (2-4) to (3-9) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (2-4) to (3-9) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to (4-12) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Malachai's Simula

explicitModifiers.text: Spells have a 20% chance to deal Double Damage

lines.flavourText:
It was a sliver of Malachai's soul
that animated the first Eternal Guardian.

lines.name: Torchoak Step

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Totems Reflect (25-100)% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage to nearby Enemies when Hit

lines.flavourText:
Centuries ago, there existed a unique grove imbued with ancestral fire.
As with all things, the Karui used its wood for war.

lines.name: Doedre's Scorn

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
(10-20)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Curse on Enemy
Adds 37 to 71 Chaos Damage for each Curse on the Enemy
Curse Skills have (30-50)% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText:
A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,
A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

lines.name: Drillneck

implicitModifiers.text: Arrows Pierce an additional Target
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (10-14) to (19-24) Physical Damage to Bow Attacks
(10-14) to (19-24) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Arrows deal 50% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments to Targets they Pierce

lines.flavourText:
"Why waste such a fine arrow on just one man?" 
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Kongming's Stratagem

implicitModifiers.text: (15-20)% increased Spell Damage

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Fog of War when your Trap is triggered
Traps from Socketed Skills create a Smoke Cloud when triggered
(30-50)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
30% reduced Spell Damage taken from Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered.
Those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. 
Thus the wise win before they fight, 
while the ignorant fight to win.

lines.name: Lioneye's Paws

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 5 Rain of Arrows when you Attack with a Bow
Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Stunned when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
Stand and lead the righteous pride,
Fight till death, never hide.

lines.name: Lochtonial Caress

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

lines.name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
lines.flavourText:
Maligaro operated effortlessly,
with great speed and terrible consequences.

lines.name: Rise of the Phoenix

implicitModifiers.text: +(8-16)% to all Elemental Resistances
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(25-28)% to Fire Resistance while on Low Life
10% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Ignited while on Low Life
100% chance to Avoid being Ignited while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
My bearer shall be guarded by flame,
for I am the phoenix, forever radiant in glory.

lines.name: Starkonja's Head

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced Damage when on Low Life
(50-150)% increased Global Evasion Rating when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
There was no hero made out of Starkonja's death,
but merely a long sleep made eternal.

lines.name: The Three Dragons

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Your Fire Damage can Shock but not Ignite
Your Cold Damage can Ignite but not Freeze or Chill
Your Lightning Damage can Freeze but not Shock

lines.flavourText:
"The ice seared his naked feet
As the lightning stilled his heart,
But it was the flames upon his lover's face
That roused him to vengeance."
- From 'The Three Dragons' by Victario of Sarn

lines.name: Three-step Assault

explicitModifiers.text: (10-30)% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments while Phasing
10% chance to Dodge Spell Hits while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Move in with haste.
Strike quick, strike hard.
Vanish like smoke in the wind.

lines.name: Perfidy

explicitModifiers.text: Having a placed Banner does not prevent you gaining Valour
You can have two different Banners at the same time
Banners you are carrying gain 1 Stage on Melee Hit, up to 5 per second
War Banner has (100-200)% increased Adrenaline duration
Defiance Banner has (100-200)% increased Taunt duration
Dread Banner has (100-200)% increased Fortify duration
Dread Banner has (100-200)% increased Fortification duration
Dread Banner grants an additional +(2-4) to maximum Fortification when placing the Banner

lines.flavourText:
The Trickster God turned the very Day and Night against each other.
What hope have you?

lines.name: Viridi's Veil

explicitModifiers.text: Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you have a Magic Ring Equipped
You are Hexproof if you have a Magic Ring in right slot
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you have a Magic Ring in left slot

lines.flavourText:
"Her sisters eternally fought for that shining apex in the skies,
but Viridi instead found strength in humility."
- Azmerian Creation Myth

lines.name: Elevore

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (100-200) Life when you Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ancient worshippers of the Greatwolf were overtaken
by a ravenous hunger for all things mystical.

lines.name: Queen of the Forest

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per (450-600) Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals

lines.flavourText:
Shedding away her regal past, 
she forged a new destiny. 
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, 
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. 
Seizing her one true wish, 
she found peace at last.

lines.name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Chance to Poison
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Lesser Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

lines.name: Asenath's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow, with a 0.3 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

lines.name: Fairgraves' Tricorne

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (6-15) to (12-25) Cold Damage to Attacks
You can be Touched by Tormented Spirits

lines.flavourText:
Fairgraves' trusty tricorne accompanied him far across
the seas, deep under the ground, and even beyond death.

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks
+(150-1000) to Evasion Rating while on Full Life
30% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: (20-35)% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: The Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (15-29) Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems Cost and Reserve Life instead of Mana
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 100% of Base Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
My Soul is your Strength
My Price is your Blood

lines.name: Deerstalker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level (11-15) Trap
(15-30)% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Volkuur's Guidance

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (16-20) to (25-30) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Fire Skills have 20% chance to Poison on Hit

lines.flavourText:
You do not cease to be when you die
any more than the caterpillar ceases to be when it cocoons.
Come, let me show you.

lines.name: Kaltenhalt

implicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Reflects (5-50) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.

lines.name: Wanderlust

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: All the world is my home.

lines.name: Black Sun Crest
lines.flavourText:
The beasts we fear the most
are the ones who dwell in total darkness.

lines.name: Heretic's Veil

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 22 Blasphemy
Socketed Curse Gems have 12% reduced Mana Reservation
Socketed Curse Gems have 12% reduced Reservation
Socketed Curse Gems have (12-30)% increased Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText:
Branded a heretic for your beliefs,
You stand alone against many.
May the truth that fuels their anger,
Carry your blade into their hearts.

lines.name: Blackgleam

implicitModifiers.text: 4 to 8 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks
Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Bow Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (30-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Adds 5 to 10 Fire Damage to Bow Attacks
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

lines.name: Ahn's Heritage

implicitModifiers.text: +(10-20) to maximum Life

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
+(2-3)% to all maximum Resistances while you have no Endurance Charges
You have Onslaught while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
"It's not Karui, Azmeri or even Vaal in origin,
but one thing is certain. It is very, very old."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 46

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-(15-2) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
(30-1000)% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Craghead

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks
1 to 4 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 6 to 10 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Adds 6 to 10 Physical Damage to Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText: Hit them hard. Hit them once.

lines.name: Crown of Thorns

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
+(5-25) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Lift it lightly, don it slow.
The spikes point out and in, you know.

lines.name: Deidbell

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Skills which Exert an Attack have (20-40)% chance to not count that Attack
Cannot Leech when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: May you never hear it toll.

lines.name: Geofri's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Holy Relics
Summoned Holy Relics have (20-25)% reduced Cooldown Recovery Rate

lines.flavourText:
In the battle for honour, Geofri won.
Not so, the battle for survival.

lines.name: Great Old One's Ward

implicitModifiers.text: 3% increased Movement Speed

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The horrors we've encountered are nothing
compared to the horrors we haven't.

lines.name: Hrimsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
(25-100)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects (10-100) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

lines.name: Meginord's Vise

explicitModifiers.text: Melee Strike Skills deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Regenerate 2% of Life per second with at least 400 Strength
Melee Hits with Strike Skills always Knockback

lines.flavourText:
Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

lines.name: Nomic's Storm

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage taken while on Full Energy Shield
20% increased Movement Speed while on Full Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: It takes a clear mind to outrun a storm.

lines.name: Ondar's Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Attack Speed when on Full Life
Adds (1-4) to (13-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
A single lightning strike fells a man.
A single knife stroke fells an empire.

lines.name: Sadima's Touch

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

lines.name: Shackles of the Wretched

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Hexes applied by Socketed Curse Skills are Reflected back to you
Curses in this item are reflected back to you
You cannot be Chilled for 3 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 3 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 3 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 1 second after being Shocked
You cannot be Shocked for 3 seconds after being Shocked
You grant (4-6) Frenzy Charges to allies on Death

lines.flavourText: Captivity breeds creativity.

lines.name: Skullhead

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage
Minions have +(10-25)% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Minions Recover 10% of their Life when they Block
Minions Regenerate 2% of Life per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was left of the Iron King was his bleached skull.
Yet it was all the Iron King needed.

lines.name: Snakebite

6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge

Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
While at maximum Frenzy Charges, Attacks Poison Enemies

lines.flavourText:
"As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

lines.name: Southbound

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

lines.flavourText:
Countless men proclaimed themselves the masters of death,
and each one succumbed to it.

lines.name: Giantsbane

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-8) to (10-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The monstrous men of yore used bows too,
theirs were just bigger.

lines.flavourText:
The empire is both the tree and the fruit.
It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within,
and when the time is right, the apple is picked. 
The idea, and our ideals, take root.

lines.name: Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of servitude, a day
of glory, an eternity of death.

lines.name: Doryani's Fist

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Doryani's ingenuity raised the Vaal Empire
to unprecedented heights. His curiosity
reduced it to ruins and bones.

lines.name: Geofri's Sanctuary

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Faith does not make us invulnerable.
It makes us immortal.

lines.name: Goldwyrm

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.flavourText: For none of us are as cruel as all of us.

. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.flavourText:
Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

- Kalisa, Prima Donna of Sarn

lines.flavourText:
There is no greater thrill than leaping into combat,
